alert.note: Alert for Alcorn (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 3:10PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Alcorn, northeastern Hardeman, McNairy, northwestern Hardin and southwestern Chester Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 310 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Masseyville, or 9 miles northwest of Selmer, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Savannah, Selmer, Chickasaw State Park, Adamsville, Silerton, Masseyville, Morris Chapel, Shiloh, Robertson, McNairy, Crump, Bethel Springs, Eastview, Michie, Guys, Ramer, Hornsby, Finger and Stantonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
